title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: set dev environment autoplieR, following: Create conda/mamba env .yml file tests/ Set python interpreter RStudio use python install test-autoplier env. give working install autoplier, use install_ap() function R/utils.R. Install dependencies may missing.

title: AutoPLIER Fit Method — autoPLIER.fit
text: x_train Training dataset used train model. pathways Pathways dataset. callbacks List callbacks apply training. batch_size Fixed batch size. maxepoch Max number epochs. verbose Verbosity mode. 0 = silent, 1 = progress bar, 2 = one line per epoch. valfrac Fraction training dataset used validation data.
